summary: This bill, the DHS Intelligence and Analysis Oversight and Transparency Act, mandates the Under Secretary for Intelligence and Analysis of the Department of Homeland Security to conduct annual audits of the Office of Intelligence and Analysis's information systems and bulk data. It defines key terms like "bulk data" and "appropriate congressional committees." The bill requires notifications to congressional committees about new bulk data sets and changes. It also mandates reports on audit findings and a Government Accountability Office (GAO) review of the audit implementation.
